meanings.definition: The quality or state of being circular.
meanings.sent1: The circularnesses of the wheel made it perfect for rolling.
meanings.sent2: The circularnesses of the table made it fit perfectly in the corner.
meanings.sent3: The circularnesses of the pizza made it easy to share with friends.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts had a circularnesses that always led back to the same conclusion.
meanings.sent5: The circularnesses of the maze confused the participants.

meanings.definition: The property of having a circular shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The circularnesses of the ring symbolized eternity.
meanings.sent2: The circularnesses of the moon was visible in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The circularnesses of the pancake made it look like a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: The circularnesses of the dance floor allowed for smooth movements.
meanings.sent5: The circularnesses of the pond reflected the surrounding trees.
